Class Intersection

java.lang.Object

public class Intersection
extends java.lang.Object

Intersection of a ray with an object.

Intersection

Creates an Intersection of a ray and an object, with the corresponding position, normal and material.

Parameters:
r - Ray that was intersected.
intersPosition - Position of the intersection.
intersNormal - Normal at the intersection.
m - Material of the intersected object.
